ComicInfo.Title: A Child Shall Lead Them
ComicInfo.Summary: Spider-Man and Thor together against the Black Abbott and his savage Black Apostles in the culmination of the Black Abbott trilogy! The Black Abbott is out to steal the greatest prize of all, the powers of the mighty Thor! Plus, more developments on Spidey's costume!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:44:24. [Issue ID 39425]
